Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Wildebeest \Wilde"beest`\, n. [D. wild wild + beeste beast.] (Zo["o]l.) The gnu. [1913 Webster]
wildebeest n : large African antelope having a head with horns like an ox and a long tufted tail [syn: {gnu}]
